pr_title: Use JAXB for Base64 encoding in aws sdk with Java 9+

timeline.bodyText: Why do we want to add this to the development configs? Is this related to adding the JAXB dependency?
timeline.author: electrum

replies.bodyText: Adding this helped to discover the warning from aws sdk, I thought it might be useful to discover similar issues in future. I can remove it if it's not useful to have it here.
replies.author: raunaqmorarka

replies.bodyText:
INFO is the default level, so this is decreasing the level to WARN. Do you see warnings without this change?
I was concerned that this PR was causing the SDK to log more messages at INFO level and you were thus trying to hide them.
replies.author: electrum

replies.bodyText: My bad, I somehow mistakenly thought that the warning wasn't showing up with the default config but I've now confirmed that it does. Reverted this change.
replies.author: raunaqmorarka

timeline.message: Use JAXB for Base64 encoding in aws sdk with Java 9+
Use JAXB for Base64 encoding in aws sdk with Java 9+
